programs_manager_node.py

1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import queue
3 from threading import Thread, Event
4 
5 import actionlib
6 from actionlib import ServerGoalHandle
7 import rospy
8 import logging
9 import os
10 
11 from niryo_robot_utils import sentry_init
12 
13 from actionlib_msgs.msg import GoalStatus
14 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.ProgramsManager import ProgramsManager
15 
16 # Command Status
17 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
18 
19 # Messages
20 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.msg import Program, ProgramList
21 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.msg import ExecuteProgramResult, ExecuteProgramFeedback, ExecuteProgramGoal
22 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.msg import ExecuteProgramAction
23 
24 # Services
25 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import Trigger, GetString
26 from niryo_robot_database.srv import GetSettings, SetSettings
27 
28 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.srv import GetProgram, GetProgramList
29 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.srv import GetProgramAutorunInfos
30 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.srv import CreateProgram, DeleteProgram, UpdateProgram
31 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.srv import SetProgramAutorun, SetProgramAutorunRequest
32 
33 
34 class ProgramManagerNode:
35 
36  def __init__(self):
37  rospy.logdebug("Programs Manager - Entering in Init")
38 
39  # Autorun
40  self.__get_setting_service = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_database/settings/get', GetSettings)
41  self.__set_setting_service = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_database/settings/set', SetSettings)
42 
43  database_path = os.path.expanduser(rospy.get_param('/niryo_robot_database/database_path'))
44  programs_base_dir = os.path.expanduser(rospy.get_param("~programs_dir"))
45 
46  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_id = None
47  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_mode = None
48  self.__autorun_mode_to_str = {
49  SetProgramAutorunRequest.DISABLE: "DISABLE",
50  SetProgramAutorunRequest.ONE_SHOT: "ONE_SHOT",
51  SetProgramAutorunRequest.LOOP: "LOOP",
52  }
53  self.__str_to_autorun_mode = {v: k for k, v in self.__autorun_mode_to_str.items()}
54 
55  self.__stop_autorun_event = Event()
56 
57  self.__programs_manager = ProgramsManager(database_path, programs_base_dir)
58 
59  # Action Server
60  self.__execute_program_action_server = actionlib.ActionServer('~execute_program',
61  ExecuteProgramAction,
62  goal_cb=self.__callback_execute_program_goal,
63  cancel_cb=self.__execute_program_cancel_cb,
64  auto_start=False)
65  self.__execute_program_action_server.start()
66 
67  self.__execute_program_action_client = actionlib.ActionClient('~execute_program', ExecuteProgramAction)
68 
69  # Services
70  rospy.Service('~create_program', CreateProgram, self.__callback_create_program)
71  rospy.Service('~delete_program', DeleteProgram, self.__callback_delete_program)
72  rospy.Service('~update_program', UpdateProgram, self.__callback_update_program)
73  rospy.Service('~get_program', GetProgram, self.__callback_get_program)
74  rospy.Service('~stop_execution', Trigger, self.__callback_stop_execution)
75  rospy.Service('~get_program_list', GetProgramList, self.__callback_get_program_list)
76 
77  # Publisher
78  self.__program_list_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~program_list', ProgramList, latch=True, queue_size=1)
79 
80  # - Autorun
81  rospy.Service('~set_program_autorun', SetProgramAutorun, self.__callback_set_program_autorun)
82  rospy.Service('~get_program_autorun_infos', GetProgramAutorunInfos, self.__callback_get_program_autorun_infos)
83  rospy.Service('~execute_program_autorun', Trigger, self.__callback_execute_program_autorun)
84 
85  rospy.on_shutdown(self.stop_program)
86 
87  self.__publish_program_list()
88 
89  # Set a bool to mentioned this node is initialized
90  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
91 
92  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - Started")
93 
94  def __get_setting_from_db(self, setting_name: str, default_value: str) -> str:
95  try:
96  self.__get_setting_service.wait_for_service(2)
97  except rospy.ROSException:
98  rospy.logerr("Programs Manager - Impossible to connect to the database get setting service")
99  raise
100 
101  response = self.__get_setting_service(setting_name)
102  if response.status < 0:
103  rospy.logwarn(
104  f'The setting "{setting_name}" has not been found in database. Setting it to "{default_value}"')
105  self.__set_setting_service(setting_name, default_value, 'str')
106  return default_value
107  return response.value
108 
109  @property
110  def __autorun_id(self) -> str:
111  if self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_id is None:
112  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_id = self.__get_setting_from_db('autorun_id', '')
113  return self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_id
114 
115  @property
116  def __autorun_mode(self) -> str:
117  if self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_mode is None:
118  autorun_mode_str = self.__get_setting_from_db('autorun_mode', 'DISABLE')
119  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_mode = self.__str_to_autorun_mode[autorun_mode_str]
120  return self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_mode
121 
122  # -- ROS CALLBACKS
123  # Program
124  def __callback_create_program(self, req):
125  program_id = self.__programs_manager.create_program(req.name,
126  req.description,
127  req.python_code,
128  req.blockly_code)
129  self.__publish_program_list()
130  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, f'Program "{req.name}" successfully created', program_id
131 
132  def __callback_delete_program(self, req):
133  self.__programs_manager.delete_program(req.program_id)
134  self.__publish_program_list()
135  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Program successfully deleted'
136 
137  def __callback_update_program(self, req):
138  if not self.__programs_manager.exists(req.program_id):
139  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST, f'No program with id {req.program_id}'
140  self.__programs_manager.update_program(req.program_id,
141  req.name,
142  req.description,
143  req.python_code,
144  req.blockly_code)
145  self.__publish_program_list()
146  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Program successfully updated'
147 
148  def __callback_get_program(self, req):
149  program = self.program_msg_from_program_manager(self.__programs_manager.get(req.program_id))
150  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, f'Successfully retrieved program "{program.program_id}"', program
151 
152  def __callback_get_program_list(self, _):
153  ros_programs = [self.program_msg_from_program_manager(program) for program in self.__programs_manager.programs]
154  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully retrieved programs', ros_programs
155 
156  def __callback_execute_program_goal(self, goal_handle: ServerGoalHandle):
157  rospy.logdebug(f'Received goal "{goal_handle.get_goal_id()}"')
158  if self.__programs_manager.execution_is_running:
159  status = CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_PROGRAM_ALREADY_RUNNING
160  message = "Program is already running"
161  goal_handle.set_rejected(ExecuteProgramResult(status=status, message=message), message)
162  return
163 
164  goal = goal_handle.goal.goal
165 
166  if goal.code_string == '' and not self.__programs_manager.exists(goal.program_id):
167  status = CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST
168  message = "Program does not exist"
169  goal_handle.set_rejected(ExecuteProgramResult(status=status, message=message), message)
170  return
171 
172  rospy.logdebug('Goal accepted')
173  goal_handle.set_accepted()
174  Thread(target=self.__execute_program, args=[goal_handle], daemon=True).start()
175 
176  def __execute_program(self, goal_handle: ServerGoalHandle):
177  goal = goal_handle.goal.goal
178  try:
179  # execute the program
180  if goal.code_string != '':
181  self.__programs_manager.execute_from_code(goal.code_string)
182  else:
183  self.__programs_manager.execute_from_id(goal.program_id)
184 
185  # handle the feedback
186  feedback = ExecuteProgramFeedback()
187  while True:
188  try:
189  output = self.__programs_manager.output_queue.get(block=True)
190  if output is None:
191  break
192  feedback.output += output
193  goal_handle.publish_feedback(feedback)
194  except queue.Empty:
195  rospy.sleep(0.1)
196 
197  # set the final goal status
198  if goal_handle.get_goal_status().status == GoalStatus.ACTIVE:
199  if self.__programs_manager.execution_is_success:
200  message = 'Execution success'
201  goal_handle.set_succeeded(ExecuteProgramResult(status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message=message),
202  message)
203  else:
204  message = 'Execution failed'
205  goal_handle.set_aborted(
206  ExecuteProgramResult(
207  status=CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_EXECUTION_FAILED,
208  message=message,
209  ),
210  message)
211  else:
212  rospy.logwarn('The goal status is not "active" anymore. It\'s most likely it has been canceled.')
213  except Exception as e:
214  message = f'An unknown error happened during program execution: {e}'
215  rospy.logerr(message)
216  goal_handle.set_aborted(
217  ExecuteProgramResult(
218  status=CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_EXECUTION_FAILED,
219  message=message,
220  ),
221  message)
222 
223  def __execute_program_cancel_cb(self, goal_handle: ServerGoalHandle):
224  self.stop_program()
225  goal_handle.set_canceled(
226  ExecuteProgramResult(status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message='The execution has been stopped'))
227 
228  # Autorun
229  def __callback_set_program_autorun(self, req):
230  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_mode = req.mode
231  mode_str = self.__autorun_mode_to_str[req.mode]
232  self.__set_setting_service('autorun_mode', mode_str, 'str')
233 
234  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_id = req.program_id
235  self.__set_setting_service('autorun_id', req.program_id, 'str')
236 
237  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully set autorun'
238 
239  def __callback_get_program_autorun_infos(self, _req):
240  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'OK', self.__autorun_id, self.__autorun_mode
241 
242  def __callback_execute_program_autorun(self, _req):
243  if self.__programs_manager.execution_is_running:
244  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_EXECUTION_FAILED, "Program is already running"
245 
246  if self.__autorun_mode == SetProgramAutorunRequest.DISABLE:
247  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - Autorun disable")
248  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_AUTORUN_FAILURE, "Autorun disable"
249 
250  def execute_autorun(loop_mode=False):
251  client_goal_handle = self.__execute_program_action_client.send_goal(
252  ExecuteProgramGoal(program_id=self.__autorun_id))
253  while client_goal_handle.get_comm_state() != actionlib.CommState.DONE:
254  rospy.sleep(0.1)
255 
256  if not self.__stop_autorun_event.is_set() and loop_mode:
257  execute_autorun(loop_mode)
258  else:
259  self.__stop_autorun_event.clear()
260 
261  autorun_thread = Thread(target=execute_autorun,
262  daemon=True,
263  args=[self.__autorun_mode == SetProgramAutorunRequest.LOOP])
264  autorun_thread.start()
265 
266  message = "Autorun execution started"
267  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - {}".format(message))
268  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message
269 
270  def __callback_stop_execution(self, _):
271  self.stop_program()
272  self.__execute_program_action_client.cancel_all_goals()
273  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Execution successfully stopped'
274 
275  # - Functions
276 
277  @staticmethod
278  def program_msg_from_program_manager(program):
279  return Program(program_id=program['id'],
280  name=program['name'],
281  description=program['description'],
282  has_blockly=program['has_blockly'],
283  saved_at=program['saved_at'],
284  python_code=program['python_code'],
285  blockly_code=program['blockly_code'])
286 
287  def __publish_program_list(self):
288  ros_programs = [self.program_msg_from_program_manager(program) for program in self.__programs_manager.programs]
289  self.__program_list_publisher.publish(ros_programs)
290 
291  def stop_program(self):
292  if not self.__programs_manager.execution_is_running:
293  return
294 
295  self.__stop_autorun_event.set()
296  self.__programs_manager.stop_execution()
297  self.__stop_robot_action()
298 
299  @staticmethod
300  def __stop_robot_action():
301  # Stop current move command
302  try:
303  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/stop_command', 1)
304  stop_cmd = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/stop_command', Trigger)
305  stop_cmd()
306  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException):
307  pass
308 
309 
310 if __name__ == "__main__":
311  sentry_init()
312 
313  rospy.init_node('niryo_programs_manager_v2', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
314 
315  # change logger level according to node parameter
316  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
317  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
318  logger.setLevel(log_level)
319 
320  try:
321  node = ProgramManagerNode()
322  rospy.spin()
323  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
324  pass
